section.p: This ZenPack monitors the following item counts defined in your AWS account for Regions.

sl.sli: Elastic IPs, Instances, Subnets, VPC Security Groups, VPC Security Groups Rules (max), Volumes

section.p: By default, these soft-limit metrics are collected every 5 minutes, and a event is triggered when a metric approaches its threshold value.
The threshold for each count is set to its default limit value. If you change a count's limit in your AWS account, change the maximum value of its threshold in .
